member.name: T:BankApplication.Account
member.summary: Base Account Class. Contains base constructor for balance, the property balance, and the base credit and debit.

member.name: P:BankApplication.Account.Balance
member.summary: Balance property with setter and getter.

member.name: M:BankApplication.Account.Credit(System.Decimal)
member.summary: Base credit method. Adds input to balance.

member.name: M:BankApplication.Account.Debit(System.Decimal)
member.summary: Base debit method. Subtracts input from balance.
member.param: The number to subtract from the balance.
member.returns: Returns if the debit was possible or not

member.name: T:BankApplication.CheckingAccount
member.summary: Derived class from Account that adds a fee per transaction.

member.name: M:BankApplication.CheckingAccount.#ctor(System.Decimal,System.Decimal)
member.summary: Constructor that uses the base constructor for balance, and takes a fee
member.param: takes an input from the user to make the initial balance

member.name: M:BankApplication.CheckingAccount.Credit(System.Decimal)
member.summary: Adds an inputted credit to an account before subtracting a fee
member.param: user input for credit to be added

member.name: M:BankApplication.CheckingAccount.Debit(System.Decimal)
member.summary: Subtracts an inputted debit to an account before subtracting a fee if the debit was successful.
member.param: user input for debit to be subtracted

member.name: T:BankApplication.Program
member.summary: This program accesses different types of accounts using inheritance and polymorphism.

member.summary: Runs test cases for Account, SavingsAccount, and CheckingAccount
